summary.span: 获取或设置元素内容的首选顶级字体系列。

span.span: Gets or sets the preferred top-level font family for the content of the element.

value.span: 一个 对象，指定首选字体系列，或者指定一个主要首选字体系列并附带一个或多个备用字体系列。

span.span: A object that specifies the preferred font family, or a primary preferred font family with one or more fallback font families.

value.span: 默认字体是由 值确定的字体。

span.span: The default is the font determined by the value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定多个系列，第二个和后续的字体系列作为备用系列在主字体系列的不可用或不适用情况下使用。When multiple families are specified, the second and subsequent font families serve as fallback families to be used in cases where the primary font family is unavailable or not applicable. 此属性指定的首选项。This property specifies a preference only. 如果指定的字体系列不可用，以无提示方式回退到由字体值。If the specified font family is not available, the silently falls back to the font determined by the value. 此依赖项属性还具有附加的属性用法。This dependency property also has an attached property usage. 在中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，这种用法并\<*对象* ="*值*".../ >，其中*对象*是对象元素 （通常流元素）包含在，并*值*是字符串格式值之一，如 XAML 值中所述。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the usage is \<*object* ="*value*".../>, where *object* is an object element (typically a flow element) contained within a , and *value* is one of the string-format values as explained in XAML Values. 在代码中，附加的属性用法受和方法。In code, the attached property usage is supported by the and methods. 附加的属性用法并不常见，因为大多数元素可以包含在支持一个类似的非附加的`FontFamily`属性，内容主机使用进行呈现。The attached property usage is not common, because most elements that can be contained in a support an analogous nonattached `FontFamily` property, which the content host uses for rendering. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: 获取或设置元素内容的字体大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the font size for the content of the element.

value.span: 需要使用到与设备无关的像素的字体大小，大于 0.001 且小于或等于 35791。

span.span: The desired font size to use in device independent pixels, greater than 0.001 and less than or equal to 35791.

value.span: 默认值取决于当前系统设置和上值。

span.span: The default depends on current system settings and depends on the value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此依赖项属性还具有附加的属性用法。This dependency property also has an attached property usage. 在中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，这种用法并\<*对象* ="*值*".../ >，其中*对象*是对象元素 （通常流元素）包含在，并*值*是字符串格式值之一，如 XAML 值中所述。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the usage is \<*object* ="*value*".../>, where *object* is an object element (typically a flow element) contained within a , and *value* is one of the string-format values as explained in XAML Values. 在代码中，附加的属性用法受和方法。In code, the attached property usage is supported by the and methods. 附加的属性用法并不常见，因为大多数元素可以包含在支持一个类似的非附加的`FontSize`属性，内容主机使用进行呈现。The attached property usage is not common, because most elements that can be contained in a support an analogous nonattached `FontSize` property, which the content host uses for rendering. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

exception.span: 设置为大于 35791 或小于等于 0.001 的值。

span.span: is set to a value greater than 35791 or less than or equal to 0.001.

value.span: 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此依赖项属性还具有附加的属性用法。This dependency property also has an attached property usage. 在中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，这种用法并\<*对象* ="*值*".../ >，其中*对象*是对象元素 （通常流元素）包含在，并*值*是一个字符串格式的属性名称类。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the usage is \<*object* ="*value*".../>, where *object* is an object element (typically a flow element) contained within a , and *value* is one of the string-format property names of the class. 在代码中，附加的属性用法受和方法。In code, the attached property usage is supported by the and methods. 附加的属性用法并不常见，因为大多数元素可以包含在支持一个类似的非附加的`FontStretch`属性，内容主机使用进行呈现。The attached property usage is not common, because most elements that can be contained in a support an analogous nonattached `FontStretch` property, which the content host uses for rendering. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , | ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性，使用作为示例元素。The following example shows how to set the attribute, using as the example element. remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示可用的预定义的画笔颜色样本表，请参阅。For a table of swatches that shows the available predefined brush colors, see . 此依赖项属性还具有附加的属性用法。This dependency property also has an attached property usage. 在中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，这种用法并\<*对象* ="*值*".../ >，其中*对象*是对象元素 （通常流元素）包含在，并*值*是一个字符串，将解析为实现值。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the usage is \<*object* ="*value*".../>, where *object* is an object element (typically a flow element) contained within a , and *value* is a string that resolves to a implementation value. 在代码中，附加的属性用法受和方法。In code, the attached property usage is supported by the and methods. 附加的属性用法并不常见，因为大多数元素可以包含在支持一个类似的非附加的`Foreground`属性，内容主机使用进行呈现。The attached property usage is not common, because most elements that can be contained in a support an analogous nonattached `Foreground` property, which the content host uses for rendering. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , | ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性，使用作为示例元素。The following example shows how to set the attribute, using as the example element. [!code-xaml[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_BackgroundXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_textelement_backgroundxaml)] 下图显示了前面的示例中的呈现效果。The following figure shows how the preceding example renders. ![屏幕快照： 前景为绿色，背景为橘黄色](~/add/media/textelement-foreback.png "屏幕快照： 前景为绿色，背景为橘黄色")![Screenshot: Foreground of green, background bisque](~/add/media/textelement-foreback.png "Screenshot: Foreground of green, background bisque") 下面的示例演示如何设置属性以编程方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_Background](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textelement_background)] [!code-vb[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_Background](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textelement_background)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection TextEffects { get; set; }
.property instance class System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection TextEffects
Public Property TextEffects As TextEffectCollection

member this.TextEffects : System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置应用于元素内容的文本效果集合。

span.span: Gets or sets a collection of text effects to apply to the content of the element.

value.span: 一个 ，其中包含一个或多个 对象，这些对象定义了要应用于此元素内容的效果。

span.span: A containing one or more objects that define effects to apply to the content in this element.

value.span: 默认值为 （不是空集合）。

span.span: The default is (not an empty collection).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，此属性设置为`null`且不具有与之关联。By default, this property is set to `null` and has no associated with it. 在添加任何文本效果之前, 创建一个新并将其分配给此属性。Before adding any text effects, create a new and assign it to this property. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建一个简单的文本效果并将其应用于文本通过属性。The following example shows how to create a simple text effect and apply it to a text through the property. [!code-csharp[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_TextEffects](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textelement_texteffects)] [!code-vb[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_TextEffects](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textelement_texteffects)]

summary.span: 获取该元素内容的当前有效的版式变体。

span.span: Gets the currently effective typography variations for the content of the element.

value.span: 一个 对象，它指定当前有效的版式变体。

span.span: A object that specifies the currently effective typography variations.

value.span: 有关默认版式值的列表，请参见 。

span.span: For a list of default typography values, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是仅适用于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)]字体。The property is applicable only to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] fonts. 版式变体不起上不支持变体的字体。A typography variant has no effect on fonts that do not support the variant. 本主题的详细信息，请参阅[WPF 中的版式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/typography-in-wpf.md)。For more information on this topic, see [Typography in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/typography-in-wpf.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性，使用作为示例元素。The following example shows how to set the attribute, using as the example element. [!code-xaml[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_TypogXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_textelement_typogxaml)] 下图显示了前面的示例中的呈现效果。The following figure shows how the preceding example renders. ![屏幕截图： 改变版式的文本](~/add/media/textelement-typog.png "屏幕截图： 改变版式的文本")![Screenshot: Text with altered typography](~/add/media/textelement-typog.png "Screenshot: Text with altered typography") 与此相反，下图显示了一个具有默认版式属性的类似示例的呈现效果。In contrast, the following figure shows how a similar example with default typographic properties renders. ![屏幕截图： 改变版式的文本](~/add/media/textelement-typog-default.png "屏幕截图： 改变版式的文本")![Screenshot: Text with altered typography](~/add/media/textelement-typog-default.png "Screenshot: Text with altered typography") 下面的示例演示如何设置属性以编程方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_Typog](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textelement_typog)] [!code-vb[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_Typog](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textelement_typog)]
